law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. VI, sec. 616, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 128, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 286, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 99, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 345, sec. 3. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 15, sec. 1.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Office of education for exceptional children -- Functions -- Duties of State Board for Elementary and Secondary Education.
